bibl.title: Fayum Cemeteries and their Portraits.
bibl.note: Kom Aushim (Karanis). - Umm el Baragat now Umm el-Breigat (Tebtunis). - er-Rubayat. - Fag el-Gamus. - el-Hibeh.
